name: Totore
description:
Sinopse: Someone helped you to escape from your cell, now kill everyone and escape from the jail!

Game made on stream (BR): https://www.twitch.tv/player_dbr
Have fun o/!

PS: Totore is the name of our main character in honor of one of my oldiest subscribers on twitch ♥.

A rua é nois #Salve
